text:
[Verse]
Wake up sun ain't shining bright
But I don't mind the cloudy sky
Puddle jumpin' with no shame
Let the drops just kiss my name

[Verse 2]
Shoes are soaked but spirits high
Laughing loud as clouds roll by
Splashin' colors all around
In the rain we won't back down

[Chorus]
Dancin' in the rain oh-oh
Feel the beat so let it flow
Twinkle toes on wet pavement
Every moment heaven sent

[Verse 3]
Lightning flash and thunder's call
No umbrella won’t need it at all
Let the water wash our fears
Grab my hand and lend your cheer

[Verse 4]
Rainbow promises to find
Silver linings on my mind
Every drop a sweet refrain
Join me in this happy frame

[Chorus]
Dancin' in the rain oh-oh
Feel the beat so let it flow
Twinkle toes on wet pavement
Every moment heaven sent
title: Dancing in the Rain
